_header: Harkeneth now both more and less
_description: Tale of an incestuous daughter — at least 47 6-line stanzas (aabccb)

BodAsh61.First Lines:
That I schall neuer with þe deleAt bede at bord mete ne
                    meleMy synne I haue for sakeA sche seyd þu wyked
                    man…
BodAsh61.Last Lines:
…Vn to Ioy [Ioy] þat we may wendeLord for þi holy
                    grace
BodAsh61.Editions:
Thum,  Albert Otto. 
             “Untersuchungen über die mittelenglische fromme erzaelung, ‘A
                Tale of an Incestuous Daughter’.”  Diss. Rostock. Berlin, 1892. 
Shuffleton,  George. 
             Ashmole 61: A Compilation of Popular Middle English Verse.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008: 180-5; 491-6; 608-9.

CULFf548.First Lines:
Herkyns now bothe more and lasseI wille yow telle of aheuy
                    casse…
CULFf548.Last Lines:
…were hit neuer so gret folyAnd ȝet shalle ȝe heuon
                    wynneffinitur fabula
CULFf548.Note: Part missing, possibly an entire folio, between ff. 44-45.
CULFf548.Editions:
Thum,  Albert Otto. 
             “Untersuchungen über die mittelenglische fromme erzaelung, ‘A

Hartshorne,  Charles Henry. 
             Ancient Metrical Tales.
         London: W. Pickering, 1829: 151-64.
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Altenglische Legenden: Neue Folge.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1881: 334-8.
Downing,  Janay Young A.,
                        ed.
